text: Ignacio Mendoza (born 6 June 1908, date of death unknown) was a Mexican sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Mexican male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Mexico Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City
title: Ignacio Mendoza
